channel.title: Adding godswords
channel.description:
I have an old server. Without the "jagex items" and all I wan't to add is godswords. I'm going to have people play from the silab client. So if anyone can help me add 4 godswords into my server, thank you so much.
I need it to be clean, organized, and accurate.
Correct wielding position. Special will vary. For example, specDamage = 10 (+50) hit difference. So it can hit randomly from 10 to 60. Bonuses, i'll edit. Most likely around 155 for strength.
[REP++] :)
